sentences.en: "I can't pass this up." She waved the invitation.
sentences.cn: “我不能错过这个机会，”她挥舞着请帖说。

sentences.en: As they pass by, a piteous wailing is heard.
sentences.cn: 他们经过时，响起了令人哀怜的恸哭。

sentences.en: He gave me a smile as he passed.
sentences.cn: 他经过时对我微笑了一下。

sentences.en: He stood emotionless as he heard the judge pass sentence.
sentences.cn: 他面无表情地站在那里，听法官宣布判决。

sentences.en: I bored a hole so that the fixing bolt would pass through.
sentences.cn: 我钻了个孔，好让固定插销穿过去。

sentences.en: I pass the sports centre on the way to work.
sentences.cn: 我上班的路上经过体育中心。

sentences.en: I passed the note back to her.
sentences.cn: 我把纸条递还给她。

sentences.en: Liquidize the mixture and then pass it through a sieve.
sentences.cn: 将混合物打成泥状，然后用滤网滤一下。

sentences.en: Luke badly wanted a pass mark. Still does, I daresay.
sentences.cn: 卢克曾经很想能及格，他大概现在还是很想。

sentences.en: Nancy wasn't sure if Dirk was making a pass at her.
sentences.cn: 南希不确定德克是不是在勾引她。

sentences.en: pass off glass as a gemstone.
sentences.cn: 用玻璃冒充宝石

sentences.en: Pass the salt, please.
sentences.cn: 请把盐递过来。

sentences.en: pass up a chance for promotion; an opportunity too good to pass up.
sentences.cn: 放弃一次提升的机会；一次不能放过的好机会

sentences.en: The court is expected to pass sentence later today.
sentences.cn: 预计法院今天晚些时候会宣布判决。

sentences.en: The crowd parted to let the truck pass.
sentences.cn: 人群分开让卡车通过。

sentences.en: The Estonian parliament has passed a resolution declaring the republic fully independent.
sentences.cn: 爱沙尼亚议会已经批准了一项决议，宣布该共和国完全独立。

sentences.en: The guard eyeballed him pretty hard despite his pass.
sentences.cn: 虽然他有通行证，卫兵还是直勾勾地盯着他。

sentences.en: The main railway line passes just north of Manchester.
sentences.cn: 那条铁路干线正好经过曼彻斯特北面。

sentences.en: The medical board would not pass him fit for General Service.
sentences.cn: 医疗卫生委员会不会批准他为全科医生。

sentences.en: The pass mark (= the mark you need to be successful ) is 55%.
sentences.cn: 及格分数是55分。

sentences.en: The road passes right through the town centre.
sentences.cn: 那条路正好穿过镇中心。

sentences.en: The Senate is expected to pass the bill shortly.
sentences.cn: 预计参议院不久就会通过此议案。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: This practice embarrassed Luther, but he let it pass without comment.
sentences.cn: 这种做法让卢瑟难堪，但是他未置一词。

sentences.en: This title will only pass down through the male line.
sentences.cn: 这个头衔将只能传给男性后裔。

sentences.en: We passed a group of students outside the theatre.
sentences.cn: 我们在戏院外从一群学生身旁经过。

sentences.en: We passed the winter pleasantly enough.
sentences.cn: 我们相当愉快地度过了那个冬季。

sentences.en: You could pass for a teenager. The fake painting passed for an original.
sentences.cn: 你可冒充十几岁的人。这幅伪造的画被当作真品

sentences.en: You will need at least three passes to get onto the course.
sentences.cn: 你至少需要三门及格才能上这门课。

sentences.en: Your partner should then pass the ball back to you.
sentences.cn: 然后你的搭档应该将球回传给你。

words.tran_cn: 尚可的；可通行的；（钱币等）可流通的
过路人；旅客；考试合格者

phrases.tran_cn: 二人之间交换（言语，手势，暗号等）
充作：被接受或被相信为…
(与 on， upon 连用) 下判决；定案
使用，贩卖：把（仿制品）当作真品提供、出售或流通
草草地看，马虎地读（文件）
通过测试；经受住考验；试验合格

trans.tran_cn: 合格，通行证，传球，关口，飞跃，阶段
trans.tran_en: a successful result in an examination
to come up to a particular place, person, or object and go past them
to hold something in your hand and give it to someone else

trans.tran_cn: 使经过，通过，超过，转交，转变，消逝，度过，结束，陈述，宣布，被当作，排泄
trans.tran_en: to come up to a particular place, person, or object and go past them
